venue.address_1: Address to be sent to those who RSVP "yes"
venue.name: Private Residence

item.description:
Unsere Mitglied Jon has been talking about having an Oktoberfest (in September) for a while so here it is!

He is kindly inviting us to his home and will even cook for us! 

Bring something to share, he will provide Wurst, Kartoffelsalat, and home-made Spaetzle. rain or shine.

Maybe we could bring a variety of Bier?  Nachtisch?

It would be great to see some of you who can't join us on Thursdays, or whom we haven't seen in a long time. Jon has aksed that we all RSVP on this site.  Those who say they are coming will receive his address by email.  (He lives of off Route 4 centrally located in Farmington).

Thanks, Jon!
item.name: Oktoberfest bei Jon
